title: Tubarões (Ao Vivo)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Se quer saber de mim, hum, hum
lines.translation: If you want to know about me, hum, hum
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: quer, saber (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'If you want to know about me, hum, hum'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Pergunte para mim
lines.translation: Ask me
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: pergunte (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. Meaning: 'Ask me'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Se for falar do que passou
lines.translation: If we're going to talk about what happened in the past
lines.grammar: Portuguese note: Verb focus: falar, passou (check person/tense and prefixes). Contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach; nasal endings common. lines.text: Não pergunte se estou bem
lines.translation: Don't ask if I'm okay.
